label: Report Generator
description: Generates a structured document based on input data and a selected template.

defaultInputs.name: Report Data
defaultInputs.description: The raw data objects to be injected into the report template.

defaultInputs.name: Dynamic Title
defaultInputs.description: Optional title to override the default report name.

defaultOutputs.name: Report ID
defaultOutputs.tooltip: Unique identifier for the generated report (e.g. "RPT-001").

defaultOutputs.name: Report Name
defaultOutputs.tooltip: Name or title of the generated report (e.g. "Kerry Report").

defaultOutputs.name: Report Type
defaultOutputs.tooltip: Type of report generated (e.g. "External Report", "Internal Report").

defaultOutputs.name: Reference URL
defaultOutputs.tooltip: URL link to access or download the generated report document.
